snippet: A new study provides stark evidence that the need to help people quit is more important than ever.
abstract: Editorial highlights study published in New England Journal of Medicine finding that smoking is even more harmful to health than previously thought; calls on government to expand efforts to help smokers quit, particularly state governments in the United States through programs like Medicaid.
lead_paragraph: A new study provides stark evidence that the need to help people quit is more important than ever.

headline.print_headline: The Smoking Toll Gets Much Worse
